name: Anonymous Everywhere
description:
An Anonymous Background which you can use everywhere OR specify where to use by clicking the "Edit" button after installing the Theme. Then from "Applies to : " Select the Domains. :)
Follw me on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/trickortips
Follow me on Twitter : https://twitter.com/trickortips

user.name: biswassudipta05
user.about: Hi..!! I love computer, likes to play football & chess. I am very curious & always try to find & discover new things. People can request me for custom Facebook login Backgrounds. Provide me a link of the pic(The pic should be HD so that it can be used in any screen resolution.) :)
